column2: Prometheanism is the worship of the Titan Prometheus and, to a lesser extent, his brother Epimetheus, as the fathers of humanity. Prometheanism acknowledges the existence, and divinity, of the Olympians, but rejects their worthiness as beings to be worshiped Prometheans value intellectual pursuits above all
column3:
finding guile, diplomacy, and a quick wit to be the highest art forms. They find violence distasteful, but recognize that it is ocassionally necessary.Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Prometheans gain piety while at peace.
§Y*§! The Scholarch of the First Academy leads the Promethena faitfhul.
§Y*§! Prometheans cannot use, and are not targetable by, the Pagan Subjugation CB.
§Y*§! Prometheans gain a bonus to Learning.
§Y*§! Prometheanism is a feminist faith.
§Y*§! Women may hold temples.
§Y*§! Priests can marry.
§Y*§! Promethean rulers may designate their heir.

column2: Promethean beliefs encourage intellectual pursuits and the advancements of science, technology, and logic. Promethean tend toward higher education as a result.
